value.title: How to Set Up Power BI Gateway to Connect to On Premise Data in Personal Mode
value.excerpt: Power BI Gateway acts as a bridge to let PowerBI.com (Cloud) connect to your On-Premise (Local) Data Sources ‚Äì like local Excel Files or a local SQL Server. value.title: Power BI Pivot: Move Data from Rows to Columns #Q&A
